title: Diamond Vanki Pendant - A Timeless Embrace
features: Modern interpretation of the traditional Vanki (armlet) design. Features a pavé setting of diamonds creating a delicate, openwork pattern. A larger central diamond acts as the focal point. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and modernity.
colors: White Diamonds with Rose Gold Accents
occasions: or a sophisticated everyday statement. Pairs well with modern sarees or evening gowns.
description: This Vanki pendant offers a contemporary take on a classic South Indian design, making it a versatile piece for any jewelry collection. The brilliant diamonds sparkle with captivating fire, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and a commitment to quality.
